mapper.select: select count(*) totalCount, status from cor_express_delivery express where express.dr = 0 and express.tenant_id =#{tenantId} group by express.status

select count(*) from cor_express_delivery express inner join cor_driver driver on express.driver_id = driver.id and driver.dr = 0 and driver.status = 1 inner join cor_driver_scooter dscooter on dscooter.driver_id = driver.id and dscooter.status = 1 and dscooter.dr = 0 inner join cor_user_profile profile on driver.user_id = profile.user_id and profile.dr = 0 inner join cor_tenant_scooter tscooter on tscooter.scooter_id = dscooter.scooter_id and tscooter.dr=0 where express.tenant_id =#{tenantId} and express.dr = 0
and express.id not in
#(iterm)
and TO_DAYS(express.create_time) = TO_DAYS(NOW())
and TO_DAYS(express.create_time) < TO_DAYS(NOW())
and express.status=#{status}
and express.delivery_date between #{taskStartTime} and #{taskEndTime}
and (express.delivery_start_time between #{startStartTime} and #{startEndTime})
and (express.delivery_end_time between #{deliveredStartTime} and #{deliveredEndTime})
and (profile.first_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or profile.last_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or profile.full_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or tscooter.license_plate like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )

select express.id as id, express.status as status, driver.id as driverId, profile.first_name as driverFirstName, profile.last_name as driverLastName, profile.tel_number_1 as driverPhone, profile.email_1 as driverEmail, tscooter.scooter_id as scooterId, tscooter.license_plate as licensePlate, express.order_complete_num as completeCount, express.order_sum as totalCount, express.delivery_date as taskTime, express.delivery_start_time as startTime, express.delivery_end_time as deliveredTime, express.create_time as createdTime from cor_express_delivery express inner join cor_driver driver on express.driver_id = driver.id and driver.dr = 0 and driver.status = 1 inner join cor_driver_scooter dscooter on dscooter.driver_id = driver.id and dscooter.status = 1 and dscooter.dr = 0 inner join cor_user_profile profile on driver.user_id = profile.user_id and profile.dr = 0 inner join cor_tenant_scooter tscooter on tscooter.scooter_id = dscooter.scooter_id and tscooter.dr = 0 where express.tenant_id =#{tenantId} and express.dr = 0 and express.id =#{id}

select expressDetail.express_order_id as id, expressDetail.status as status, eorder.recipient_country as recipientCountry, eorder.recipient_province as recipientProvince, eorder.recipient_postcode as recipientPostcode, eorder.recipient_city as recipientCity, eorder.recipient_address as recipientAddress, eorder.expect_time_begin as expectTimeStart, eorder.expect_time_end as expectTimeEnd from cor_express_delivery_detail expressDetail inner join cor_express_order eorder on eorder.id = expressDetail.express_order_id and eorder.dr = 0 where expressDetail.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and expressDetail.dr = 0 and expressDetail.express_delivery_id = #{id}

select driver.id as id, profile.FIRST_NAME as driverFirstName, profile.LAST_NAME as driverLastName, profile.PICTURE as avatar, count(detail.status in (1,2)) as count from cor_driver driver inner join cor_user_profile profile on driver.user_id = profile.USER_ID and profile.dr = 0 left join cor_express_delivery delivery on delivery.driver_id = driver.id and delivery.dr = 0 and delivery.status in (1, 2) left join cor_express_delivery_detail detail on detail.express_delivery_id = delivery.id and detail.dr = 0 and detail.status in (1,2) where driver.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and driver.status = 1 and driver.dr = 0 group by id,driverFirstName,driverLastName,avatar

select sum(a.historyNum) as hnum, sum(a.todayNum) as tnum from (select count(*) as todayNum, 0 historyNum from cor_express_delivery express where express.dr = 0 and TO_DAYS(create_time) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) and dr = 0 and tenant_id = #{tenantId} union all select 0 as todayNum, count(*) as historyNum from cor_express_delivery express where express.dr = 0 and TO_DAYS(create_time) < TO_DAYS(NOW()) and dr = 0 and tenant_id = #{tenantId}) a
